page.title: 06TOWN PLANNING IN MIDHURST
page.content: There are 2 different councils in this area,West Sussex County Council and Chichester District Council.They have problems caused by old buildings, beautiful countryside and old country roads.These are narrow and twisty so large vehicles cannot use them without causing damage.There are no large factories here because the smoke and appearance would ruin the atmosphere and look of the area.There are also no by-passes round Midhurst in spite of the traffic congestion because the countryside would have to be destroyed.Housing is also a problem as no high-rise buildings are allowed above 3 storeys.When a house is built it must be in a style that blends with existing houses.This can be seen in a development called Little Midhurst. Here the houses are built in the style of earlier centuries.
